info.title: Documenso v2 beta API
info.description: Subject to breaking changes until v2 is fully released.

get.description: Find documents based on a search criteria

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The pagination page number, starts at 1.

schema.description: The pagination page number, starts at 1.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page.

schema.description: The number of items per page.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: Filter documents by the template ID used to create it.

schema.description: Filter documents by the template ID used to create it.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter documents by how it was created.

schema.description: Filter documents by how it was created.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter documents by the current status

schema.description: Filter documents by the current status

externalId.description: A custom external ID you can use to identify the document.

userId.description: The ID of the user that created this document.

globalAccessAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to access the document.

globalActionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document. This field is restricted to Enterprise plan users only.

accessAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to access the document.

actionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document.

signingOrder.description: The order in which the recipient should sign the document. Only works if the document is set to sequential signing.

currentPage.description: The current page number, starts at 1.

perPage.description: The number of items per page.

get.description: Returns a document given an ID

externalId.description: A custom external ID you can use to identify the document.

userId.description: The ID of the user that created this document.

globalAccessAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to access the document.

globalActionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document. This field is restricted to Enterprise plan users only.

recipientSigningRequest.description: Whether to send an email to all recipients that the document is ready for them to sign.

recipientRemoved.description: Whether to send an email to the recipient who was removed from a pending document.

recipientSigned.description: Whether to send an email to the document owner when a recipient has signed the document.

documentPending.description: Whether to send an email to the recipient who has just signed the document indicating that there are still other recipients who need to sign the document. This will only be sent if the document is still pending after the recipient has signed.

documentCompleted.description: Whether to send an email to all recipients when the document is complete.

documentDeleted.description: Whether to send an email to all recipients if a pending document has been deleted.

ownerDocumentCompleted.description: Whether to send an email to the document owner when the document is complete.

accessAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to access the document.

actionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document.

signingOrder.description: The order in which the recipient should sign the document. Only works if the document is set to sequential signing.

page.description: The page number of the field on the document. Starts from 1.

post.description: You will need to upload the PDF to the provided URL returned. Note: Once V2 API is released, this will be removed since we will allow direct uploads, instead of using an upload URL.

externalId.description: The external ID of the document.

globalAccessAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to access the document.

globalActionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document. This field is restricted to Enterprise plan users only.

accessAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to access the document.

actionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document.

pageNumber.description: The page number the field will be on.

pageX.description: The X coordinate of where the field will be placed.

pageY.description: The Y coordinate of where the field will be placed.

subject.description: The subject of the email that will be sent to the recipients.

message.description: The message of the email that will be sent to the recipients.

timezone.description: The timezone to use for date fields and signing the document. Example Etc/UTC, Australia/Melbourne

enum: EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy hh:mm a
dateFormat.description: The date format to use for date fields and signing the document.

distributionMethod.description: The distribution method to use when sending the document to the recipients.

redirectUrl.description: The URL to which the recipient should be redirected after signing the document.

language.description: The language to use for email communications with recipients.

typedSignatureEnabled.description: Whether to allow recipients to sign using a typed signature.

post.description: Move a document from your personal account to a team

documentId.description: The ID of the document to move to a team.

teamId.description: The ID of the team to move the document to.

post.description: Redistribute the document to the provided recipients who have not actioned the document. Will use the distribution method set in the document

recipients.description: The IDs of the recipients to redistribute the document to.

get.description: Returns a single field. If you want to retrieve all the fields for a document or template, use the "Get Document" or "Get Template" request.

page.description: The page number of the field on the document. Starts from 1.

recipientId.description: The ID of the recipient to create the field for.

pageNumber.description: The page number the field will be on.

post.description: Use the template to create a document

recipients.description: The information of the recipients to create the document with.

distributeDocument.description: Whether to create the document as pending and distribute it to recipients.

customDocumentDataId.description: The data ID of an alternative PDF to use when creating the document. If not provided, the PDF attached to the template will be used.
